tables.name: accounting_balances
tables.description: This table contains the current state of each account's balance in the Cosmos ecosystem. It provides a snapshot of the liquid, staking, and reward balances for each address across various blockchains.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block at which the balance data was recorded.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block at which the balance data was recorded.

columns.name: address
columns.description: The unique address associated with the account's balance.

columns.name: liquid_balance
columns.description: The available balance in the account's native cryptocurrency.

columns.name: staking_balance
columns.description: The balance staked in the account's native cryptocurrency.

columns.name: unclaimed_rewards
columns.description: The unclaimed rewards in the account's native cryptocurrency.

columns.name: claimed_rewards
columns.description: The claimed rewards in the account's native cryptocurrency.

columns.name: liquid_balance_usdc
columns.description: The available balance in USDC (USD Coin) equivalent to the native cryptocurrency.

columns.name: staking_balance_usdc
columns.description: The balance staked in USDC (USD Coin) equivalent to the native cryptocurrency.

columns.name: unclaimed_rewards_usdc
columns.description: The unclaimed rewards in USDC (USD Coin) equivalent to the native cryptocurrency.

columns.name: claimed_rewards_usdc
columns.description: The claimed rewards in USDC (USD Coin) equivalent to the native cryptocurrency.

tables.name: celestia_delagate
tables.description: This table contains a record of transactions and actions on the Cosmos blockchain, showcasing the dynamics of token distribution and validator participation. It provides a comprehensive view of the blockchain's activity over time.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain, indicating the transaction's position in the chain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp of the block, marking the moment when the transactions within it were processed.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique hash identifying the transaction, allowing for its retrieval and verification.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block, specifying its order among other transactions.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction, indicating its position among other messages.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message, specifying its order among other actions.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the account that initiated the transaction, responsible for the token transfer.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator that participated in the transaction, responsible for verifying and processing the action.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred during the transaction, reflecting the change in token ownership.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the token, specifying its type and unit of measurement.

columns.name: new_shares
columns.description: The new amount of shares allocated or modified during the transaction, reflecting changes in token distribution.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested into the system, indicating the freshness of the information.

tables.name: celestia_undelagate
tables.description: This table provides a comprehensive overview of blockchain transactions from the Cosmos ecosystem. It contains metadata and financial information related to each transaction.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block that contains the transaction.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created.

columns.name: tx_hash
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: action_index
columns.description: The index of the action within the message.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: The address of the sender of the transaction.

columns.name: validator
columns.description: The validator who processed the transaction.

columns.name: token_amount
columns.description: The amount of tokens transferred during the transaction.

columns.name: token_denom
columns.description: The denomination of the tokens transferred during the transaction.

columns.name: completion_time
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction was completed.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested.
